mapper.delete: delete from record where tape_key=#{tapeKey} and record_key = #{recordKey}
mapper.update: update record set content = #{content}, img = #{img.saveFile}, attraction_key = #{attraction.attractionKey}, parent_record_key=IF(${parentRecordKey} = 0, NULL, #{parentRecordKey}) where tape_key=#{tapeKey} and record_key=#{recordKey}

mapper.delete: delete from user_like_record where user_id=#{userId} and tape_key=#{tapeKey} and record_key=#{recordKey}
